head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths EDWARDS, ROSALIE FRANCES

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths EDWARDS, ROSALIE FRANCES

block.p: EDWARDS-Rosalie Frances. On May 9, 2000, of Ryebrook, NY. Beloved wife of Donald. Loving mother of Cliff, Jeff, Richard and Nancy and mother-in-law of Betsy, Sue and Colleen. Grandmother of Alison, Rachel, Trevor, Savannah, Sam and Kenneth. Services will be held Thursday, May 11, 1pm at the Rye Community Synagogue, 200 Forest Ave, Rye, NY. Memorial contributions to the Alzheimer Association or Parkinson's Association would be appreciated.
